about_the_game:
This original soundtrack contains songs and BGM that color the world of "TAISHO x ALICE".
It contains not only the opening and ending themes of the main story (both in full version), but also the arranged versions of the opening songs of each episode, 9 songs and 16 BGMs in total!

* This is not a digital version of the CD "TAISHO x ALICE original Soundtrack - Kagami no kuni no Symphony -".

----------
[Update record for July 27, 2022]
To celebrate the release of "TAISHO x ALICE: HEADS & TAILS", we have added full and short versions of "Kagaminokuni no symphony", the theme song of this work!
